content.text: Not bad, could be better. My mom died when I was 6.
Oh I'm sorry to hear that. What was she like?
She was an incredible person. She was really creative and she had a huge heart.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure she's in a better place now.
Yeah, I hope so. I've just been having a hard time lately because I miss her.
It's okay to miss her. She'll always be with you in your heart.
Thanks. I know it's true. I just wish I could see her again.
I'm sure you will one day. In the meantime, just focus on making her proud.
Yeah, I'll try. Thanks for talking to me about this.
